articles.description: Apart from India, Novavax has asked Indonesia and the Philippines to allow emergency use of its Covid-19 vaccine, called Covovax.Novavax has a vaccine manufacturing agreement with Serum Institute of India
articles.content: Covid-19 vaccine manufacturing company Novavax has said that it is looking for final approval from the Indian regulators to allow its vaccine for emergency use.
